QueryDefinition.Query:
with a as ( SELECT distinct ch.person_id as PersonId, c.encid, c.carearea, c.carearea_date, c.carearea_time FROM {sc}.care_area c join {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND c.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where UPPER(c.carearea) not in ('OTHER CARE AREA', 'UNKNOWN CARE AREA') )
select a.*, pr.provid provid, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(partition by a.encid ORDER BY case when lower(provider_role) = 'attending' then 0 else 1 end, provider_role) sort_index from a left join {sc}.encounter_provider as ec ON ec.encid = a.encid left join {sc}.provider pr on ec.provid = pr.provid order by 1
